com.philips.platform.core.dbinterfaces

Interface DBFetchingInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBFetchingInterfaceSpy, VerticalDBFetchingInterfaceImpl

    public interface DBFetchingInterface
    Data Base Fetching Interfaces for implementing Fetch Operations on DB

      • putUserCharacteristicsForSync

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Class,java.util.List<?>> putUserCharacteristicsForSync(java.util.Map<java.lang.Class,java.util.List<?>> dataToSync)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Fetches the Non Synchronized UserCharacteristics Objects from Data-Base and stores it into a Map (dataToSync) The Propositions should only modify the Map and do not create a new map
        Parameters:
        dataToSync - The Map who's value has to be modified
        Returns:
        returns the map containing the key-value pair, where-in Key = Characteristics.class and value = List of None- Synchronized UserCharacteristics
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • isSynced

        boolean isSynced(int tableID)
          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks weather the Data is synced or not with the given tableId
        Parameters:
        tableID - The Table ID
        Returns:
        boolean indicating weather the data is synced or not. true = synced, false = not-synced
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws exception if DataBase operation fails
